alert.note: Alert for Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:57PM EDT until August 05 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR EASTERN LETCHER COUNTY... At 557 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Colly, or near Whitesburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Mayking around 600 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Wright, Fleming-Neon and Jenkins. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
